getClient

KtbsRootClient getClient(String user)
Give the client instance mapped to this user, and fails if no client is instanciated for this user.

Parameters:
user - the name of the user who owns the client
Returns:
the client for this user.
Throws:
RuntimeException - when no client is instanciated for the user.
